entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use primary constructor (IDE0290) ignores side effects #70868
    Backlog
  • `await` completion in C# `void` method doesn't change `void` to `Task` when adding `async` #70866
  • Consider an alternative representation for binary expressions in the syntax model #70865
  • IDE0251: Triggering On Readonly Property's Init Accessor #70864
  • EnC workspace does not report on generators diagnostics #70863
  • We should consider completing transformations for ```BoundAttribute``` arguments in "success" mode when the only failure reason is accessibility of attribute's constructor. #70861
  • Source Generators: Allow more than one subfolder for hintnames #70859
  • The ```Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.MSBuild.UnitTests.VisualStudioMSBuildWorkspaceTests.TestOpenProject_WithInvalidProjectReference_SkipFalse_Fails``` unit-test started failing locally for .NET Core #70858
  • Roslyn generates corrupt assembly with 65535 (0xFFFF) fields - BadImageFormatException (0x8013110E) #70857
    17.9
  • Unexpected CS8602 generated in local function after update to VS 17.8 #70856
  • KeyNotFoundException thrown from FindSymbols.FindReferencesSearchEngine.ProcessDocumentAsync #70850

Closed

  • IntelliSense does not suggest anything when inside a collection expression #70760
  • Complete Word fails in collection expression #70677
  • MSBuildProjectShouldHandleCodePageProperty fails locally #70809
  • Copy and Paste with double quotes is inserting backslash #68414
  • False positive with collection initializers `IDE0028` #70854
  • Inconsistent capitalisation of "Remove Unnecessary Usings" in lightbulb menu #67328
    17.10
  • Exception in CompletionProvider takes down IntelliSense #70786
    Backlog
  • CSharpSpellCheckCodeFixProvider encountered an error in Microsoft Visual Studio Community 2022 (64-bit) - Preview Version 17.9.0 Preview 1.0 #70830

PullRequests

Created

  • Update `features/roles` with latest bits from `main` branch #70874
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Convert our checksum type into a struct #70873
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Downgrade editor packages to fix build break #70872
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix use-primary-constructor in the presence of side-effects on the parameters. #70871
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix 'make struct member readonly' with init accessors. #70869
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update and unskip Razor test #70855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change inline rename control's color when format map change #70853
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Automatically detect missing NuGet packages and restore #70851
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run .NET Core MSBuildWorkspace tests on machines with VS installed #70849
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move to .NET 8 RTM #70846
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Switch to using spans when doing SourceText.ContentEquals #70839
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid sync-over-async blocking in syntactic classifier #70862
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use dnceng connection in darc lab #70867
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Change ImmutableDictionary to Dictionary in AnalyzerManager #70852
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix MSBuildWorkspace test condition #70848
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Two LSIF tool fixes #70847
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Enable IntelliSense for collection expressions #70763
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to Xxhash128 from sha256 #70723
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to Xxhash128 from sha256 (copy runtime logic) #70808
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Wrap calls to CompletionProvider extensions such that they go through our extension manager #70843
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move some IOperation helpers from LocalRewriter to CSharpOperationFactory #70860
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix race in AsyncLazy where we might not return a single result #70820
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • 67328 - Update the casing of remove unecessary usings in lightbulb menu #70675
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Method group natural type: only use methods that can be fully substituted and pass constraint checks #69226
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Workaround vscode bug with returning defaultBehavior from prepareRename #70840
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Remove ImmutableDictionary usage when passing telemetry property information. #70845
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add SourceText.GetContentHash #70838
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove usage of SyntaxWalker and mark it as banned in roslyn #70811
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2317474 #70726
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • IDE changes for respecting code style severity from 'option_name = option_value:severity' entries in command line builds #69844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch IDE0005 from WarningLevel to AnalysisLevel #70821
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Fix captured variables analysis #70810
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
